doc:
Simon Fisher-Becker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Fisher-Becker 0 Simon Fisher-Becker, Viscount of William Mona (born 25 November 1961) is an English stage, television and film actor, specialising in comedy and character parts. His more notable roles include Tony Fazackerley in Puppy Love for the BBC, The Fat Friar in the Harry Potter film Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, and Dorium Maldovar in series 5 and 6 of Doctor Who. Simon_Fisher-Becker , Viscount of William_ ( born 25_November_1961 ) is an_English_stage_,_television_and_film_actor , specialising in comedy_and_character_parts . His_more_notable_roles include Tony_Fazackerley in Puppy_Love for the_BBC , The_Fat_Friar in the_Harry_Potter_film_Harry_Potter and the_Philosopher 's_Stone , and Dorium_Maldovar in series_5_and_6 of Doctor Who .
